If you’ve been in the markets for a while, you might recall a time when Boeing (NYSE:BA
) was considered a safe investment. This year proved though, that nothing is completely safe in the markets – … [+3914 chars]

articles.author: Devik Jain, Supriya R
articles.title: US STOCKS-S&P, Nasdaq futures at record levels as Trump signs stimulus aid bill - Reuters
articles.description: Futures tracking the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq were at record levels on Monday as President Donald Trump's move to sign into law a long-awaited $2.3 trillion pandemic aid bill bolstered bets on a vaccine-led economic recovery.
articles.content:
(For a Reuters live blog on U.S., UK and European stock markets, click LIVE/ or type LIVE/ in a news window.)
* Futures up: S&P 0.7%, Dow 0.6% and Nasdaq up 0.7%
